name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
An American user posted on Xiaohongshu: "Ok, I'm curious, do you celebrate any American holidays? Like Christmas?"
In the comment section, some Chinese netizens replied that Christmas is a Korean holiday, trying to "drive a wedge between the United States and South Korea"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Around 6pm on January 15, Hong Kong. Four men in black broke into a jewelry store on Xinfeng Road with knives and hammers, threatened the store clerks and claimed to rob them, smashed at least two cabinets, stole a batch of gold jewelry, boarded a private car and fled without a trace. The store clerks then called the police.
Currently, a large number of police officers holding shields are searching in Wutongzhai Village and nearby areas where the thieves may be.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Xi Jinping said in a phone call with European Council President Costa on the 14th: China also hopes that the EU can become a partner that China can trust. 
Xi Jinping stressed that China and Europe have no fundamental conflicts of interest or geopolitical contradictions, and are partners that achieve mutual success.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hua Chunying resigns as spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Mao Ning takes over as Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
An unexplained network outage occurred in Russia.
At around 17:00 local time on the 14th, communications with major telecom operators in Russia were interrupted, and a large area of the Internet was disconnected in Russia, including the capital Moscow. The outage lasted for about 40 minutes, during which search engines and other websites could not be opened normally.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Good luck!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many villagers in Chawan Village, Xupu, Hunan reported that the Xiang family's ancestral tombs in the village were destroyed by excavators. The villagers said that the ancestral tombs were from the Qing Dynasty and had been there for hundreds of years. "Five tombs were dug up, and coffins, inscriptions and other items were lost." Angry villagers surrounded the county government to seek an explanation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: By a strange coincidence, 2.5 hours after we sent out a statistical tweet that more than 50% of the missing cases in northern Myanmar were not filed by the police, at 8:30 pm my country time, the Ministry of Public Security issued a document: sorting out the situation of our citizens who were lost or trapped abroad, and coordinating rescue efforts. At this time, a week had passed since the document was published in China and appeared on major domestic media, sparking heated discussions. Thanks to the Ministry of Public Security for working overtime in the middle of the night, and I hope that the trafficked people can return home as soon as possible.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 15, someone uploaded a video of Tiananmen Square on Chang'an Avenue in Beijing. Many netizens commented in the comments section: When will the event return? If the event returns, I will do a big job first and then sneak into the mountains; Brothers, I'm here, wherever you are, one will get back your investment, and two will make a lot of money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 11, Xiamen Xueshili property owners protested against their school district rights. Police lined up in front of the building and filmed with handheld video cameras. 
Some people were injured at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 13, a petitioner from Quanjiao County, Anhui Province, who was mentally ill, wrote a petition for help. His wife had just arrived in Beijing in 2014 and had not yet registered for petitioning. When she was sleeping in her rented house in Beijing, Tian Qijun, the director of the Quanjiao Xinhua Police Station, and eight other people broke into her house through the window and abducted her back to Quanjiao County from Beijing. The director colluded with a local private mental hospital and illegally detained his wife in the mental hospital for 23 days, and abused her in the hospital for revenge. In 2014, the Quanjiao County Public Security Bureau intercepted petitions many times, and complaints to the National Bureau of Letters and Calls have been fruitless so far.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 13, a woman in Yichang, Hubei, who had been subjected to forced demolition, posted a message asking for help. On her way to Beijing to get medicine for her seriously ill mother, the secretary of Baotahe Street sent people to snatch her suitcase that was going to hold Chinese medicine at Yichang East Railway Station. She was also injured in the eye, and her husband's hand was also injured.
She is still restricted by the Baotahe Street Office and is not allowed to go to Beijing to get medicine for her seriously ill mother.
She said: "This is a national model city for rule of law. First, they robbed my mother's property (forced demolition of the house), and now they don't allow me to go to Beijing to get medicine. They want to kill my mother. My father is a retired cadre who died on duty after contributing his life to the party and the country. He is a retired soldier who participated in the Korean War and the War to Resist U.S. Aggression and Aid Korea. Now the Communist Party's survivors are going to be killed by corrupt elements of the Baotahe Street Office in Yichang City, Hubei Province. His life is at stake."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: An American netizen said that since she downloaded Xiaohongshu, she no longer believed that she was in a first-world country. She found on Xiaohongshu that most Chinese people did not seem to have so many mental traumas, while Americans were not only very indifferent but also sarcastic. "What happened between our government and other governments? It feels like we are living in layers of deception."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Harbin netizens contributed: 
Almost every day, the departments under the Harbin Urban Management Law Enforcement Bureau receive tasks in the WeChat group, requiring everyone to report texts and videos that complain about the urban management department and damage the image of the Harbin government on Douyin, Kuaishou, Toutiao, and WeChat. 
Sometimes, the law enforcement personnel of the unit are organized to establish WeChat groups to report the people who seek help and accusations online according to the requirements of the Cyberspace Administration of China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security announced the latest minimum wage standards for all provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities. Data shows that currently, 19 of the 31 provinces have a first-tier minimum wage standard of RMB 2,100 or more.
Netizens said: It’s already the minimum wage, why do we have to divide it into first, second, third, and fourth tiers?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 16 (Released) An American "TiKTok refugee" drew Xi Jinping on paper to express his love for China.
The account is currently unavailable and is suspected to have been banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 16 (Released) An American netizen posted a video on Xiaohongshu saying that he came for peace because the US government betrayed them and took away their platform for free speech (TikTok) 
Currently, the user's account and nickname are entered, and this person can no longer be searched, and it is suspected that the account has been blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 11, the National Acupuncture Anesthesia Clinical Research Alliance was established.
It is reported that acupuncture anesthesia is a combination of traditional Chinese acupuncture techniques and modern anesthesia techniques. Manual needle twisting or electroacupuncture stimulates a certain acupoint or acupoints to achieve the purpose of analgesia, so that the operation can be performed without anesthetic drugs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 15, a Jewish "TikTok refugee" was discriminated against and attacked by some Chinese netizens on Xiaohongshu.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 7, the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee’s Social Work Department issued a notice soliciting comments on the “Guiding Opinions on Residents’ Committees Temporarily Acting on Behalf of Owners’ Committees”.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 15 (Released) A food delivery boy smashed an electric bike in front of a traffic police officer and took away the battery inside.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 15, a Finnish netizen posted on Xiaohong: Chinese netizens, can you tell me what wrong reports about China the Western media have made? 
So far, the post has received more than 5,000 likes, but no comments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 15, a foreign user posted a question on Xiaohongshu: Do Chinese universities really have Marxist courses?
But after clicking on the post, the system displayed: "The current content cannot be displayed"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 15 (released)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 16, a Henan village bank depositor said that Yuan Xiaogang, the current vice president of the Zhengzhou Intermediate Court, had detained all the depositors who came to Henan to ask for their deposits back by unknown persons and then dragged them in front of Yuan Xiaogang for brainwashing. Yuan Xiaogang was recently officially awarded the title of "National Model Judge".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A 12-year-old female student reported that the school was delaying classes, and the receiving department disclosed the phone number to the school, causing the female student to collapse and jump off the building.
January 15 (Released) Zhangzhou, Fujian. The family posted that the 12-year-old daughter called 12345 to report that the teacher in Zhangzhou No. 3 Experimental Community assigned too much homework and delayed classes for no reason. 12345 fed back the report to the school and leaked the reporter's phone number.
On December 30, 2024, after the school found out the identity of the reporter, the teacher put pressure on the class to create a terrifying and tense atmosphere. After the daughter took the initiative to admit it, she was criticized and educated by the teacher alone. In the end, the daughter chose to jump off the building to commit suicide in an emotional breakdown.
According to the family, the Education Bureau responded afterwards that the school did not need to bear any responsibility.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the official of the movie "Operation Dragon" said in the publicity that since many lines in the movie involve confidential information, in order to protect the secrets of the motherland, the lines were handwritten before filming. In addition, Chinese actors have to be alert to their surroundings when reciting lines, and they will quickly put away the script when they see foreign actors walking by. Netizens said that the lines involve confidential information, so should we watch it or not? Some netizens said that they chose not to watch the movie for confidentiality, and then the movie officials deleted the video

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 15 (Released) Chongqing. 28-year-old mother Lin Jing took her two children to set up a stall to raise money for her children's medical treatment. According to Lin Jing, she gave birth to her eldest son 10 years ago and found that he had congenital heart disease. His father couldn't bear it and chose to jump into the river to commit suicide, leaving them mother and daughter. Later, she married and gave birth to a daughter, but they were eventually forced to separate due to family conflicts. Now she is alone with her children to set up a stall for medical treatment. At present, the eldest son has undergone two operations, and will undergo the third operation after the Spring Festival. She needs to save money for the operation. She said that she will not give up saving her children no matter what.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 16, a vendor in Songjiang District, Shanghai, held a banner outside a subway station, accusing the local urban management team of violent law enforcement and illegally detaining his vehicle and thousands of kilograms of fruit without any procedures. The vendor was worried that his seized fruit would not be properly preserved and would rot and spoil if detained for a long time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A Xiaohongshu netizen said that after reading the reconciliation of American netizens on Xiaohongshu, he had a question: why are the American people so tolerant?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Shanghai. Chenxiang Village Committee and the property management company jointly issued a notice that they will collect "population comprehensive service fees" from the residents of the village on February 15. Residents aged 16 to 89 will pay the fee at 10 yuan per person per month or 120 yuan per person per year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Economic Observer: Vanke President Zhu Jiusheng was taken away by the public security authorities. The reporter called Zhu Jiusheng and the board secretary Zhu Xu many times, but no one answered.
Vanke was the first real estate company in the industry to call for "survival". In December last year, Vanke's US dollar bonds fell sharply.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 15, a Weibo celebrity wrote: "Do you know why Americans think Chinese people's lives are beautiful and easy?"
Netizen: (Because) all the bad things are gone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Li Liang, vice president of Douyin, said on the 16th that having an overseas IP does not mean that the user is registered overseas. In addition, Douyin found that many people also took advantage of this wave and copied videos to impersonate foreign users. More than 10,000 counterfeit accounts have been dealt with.
A blogger engaged in cross-border e-commerce said that many domestic teams even created accounts overnight, copied the videos of Internet celebrities on overseas platforms back to domestic platforms, and then opened windows to sell goods with small yellow carts; or realized through advertising. The blogger said, "In terms of business sense, it has to be our own people."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 16, many netizens posted on social media that Alipay had a bug between 14:40 and 14:45, and the order payment amount would be reduced by 20%, and "government subsidy" would be displayed. As of now, Alipay has not responded.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 15, an American "TikTok refugee" posted on Xiaohongshu: Hello everyone, I am a lesbian from the United States. 
Subsequently, the post was deleted by the platform and the user's account was banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 15, Huangshi, Hubei. A woman posted a video, saying that she was forcibly sent to a mental hospital by government officials many times. In order to defraud national medical subsidies, Huangshi Mental Hospital forged signatures and medical records and illegally detained normal people.
The "Hospitalization Statement" released by the woman showed that after Liu Qingxiang was discharged from the hospital, she petitioned online and sent complaint letters every day. The government department had no choice but to forcibly send her to the hospital. After being admitted to the hospital, she waited for her family to give further consent and information. She did not receive any treatment during her stay in the hospital. At around 16:00, government staff and her family took her out of the hospital. "

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A shrine in Shizuoka Prefecture, Japan, was vandalized by a 39-year-old Chinese man on the afternoon of the 15th. He made several holes in the shrine's wall and cut off 8-10 ropes used to ward off evil spirits with a knife.
After the Chinese man was arrested, he was found to be carrying a folding knife and was incoherent. The police are investigating whether he has basic mental judgment and behavioral ability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Bloomberg reports that economists predict that China is expected to experience the longest deflation since the Mao Zedong era. 
According to most economists' forecasts, deflation will continue for the second consecutive year in 2024, and official data is expected to be released on Friday. Some major Wall Street banks, including JPMorgan Chase and Citigroup, predict that deflation may continue until 2025. This situation has not been seen since the end of Mao Zedong's "Great Leap Forward" movement. 
Although China's actual economic growth rate is expected to accelerate in the fourth quarter of 2024, the gross domestic product deflator, the most commonly used indicator of price changes in an economy, is expected to reach -0.2% in 2025, which is the median forecast of 15 analysts surveyed by Bloomberg. The average value in the decade before the epidemic was 3.4%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 15, an American netizen posted a photo of his school lunch on Xiaohongshu. Some Chinese netizens posted pictures of delicious fish and meat in the comment section.
Another netizen said: "I actually searched through the photo album and finally found a picture that was not from Pinhaofan." "They just posted the daily free lunch. Can Chinese people eat delicious fish, meat and crabs every day?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Hong Kong Maritime and Port Authority announced that in December last year, the container throughput of Hong Kong Port fell by 4.2% year-on-year to 1.191 million standard containers (TEUs); the annual decline was 4.9% to 13.69 million TEUs, and the container throughput of Hong Kong Port hit a new low in 28 years.
